title: looping around invalid block and unable to sync blockchain
body:
develop f047699

I will delete my blockchain dir, but eventually probably should have some friendlier fix for user.  Sending obscuren my blockchain dir.

killed the chain and resynced and stuck on 70625:

```

```

here's the trace from kill -QUIT:
https://gist.github.com/ethers/30bd2220bb292f3b233b
The two errors do not relate

ok so the first issue of looping is caused by not disconnecting the offending peer .
this is because @obscuren commented out https://github.com/ethereum/go-ethereum/blob/f047699afbf4773cc9ab37e61af7d72564a12008/eth/protocol.go#L386
the unknown parent issue is real caused by a stupid forgotten lock, to be fixed in the next PR.
it's an intermittent datarace issue, so you should be able to restart geth and pray :)
